name: com.huuuge.huf.purchases
description:
Purchases module can be used to integrate Unity IAP system for Android or iOS. 
Current module includes:

• Store info (items price and availability)
• Purchasing non-consumable and consumable items
• Restoring transactions
• Refunding transactions (optional)
• Locally verifying transactions (optional)
• Unity IAP version: 1.23.1

huf.message: Please, before installing this package enable In App Purchases via Services window and import latest Unity IAP package.
